Author: Yojimbonufc
Text: R/1500isplenty   I don't know if that's how you link things correctly but starving yourself is not good. Your body enters starvation mode and burns off other things what holding onto fat.   Also breakfast really is an important meal. Buy some healthy snacks to graze through the day if you want to keep your calories down. Forcing yourself into starvation mode is really bad for you.
